name: InVision
description: InVision's main website showcases the company's design and collaboration products, as well as resources for designers and design teams.

name: Inside Design
description: Inside Design is InVision's blog and resource hub for designers, featuring articles, tutorials, podcasts, and more.

name: DesignBetter.co
description: DesignBetter.co is a resource hub and community for design professionals, featuring articles, podcasts, and books about design and collaboration.

name: Treehouse
description: Treehouse's main website provides information about the platform's courses and features, as well as resources for learners and teams.

name: Techdegree
description: Techdegree's website outlines the features and benefits of the web development bootcamp-style program, as well as providing information about curriculum and projects.

name: CodeinWP
description: CodeinWP is a blog and resource hub for web design and development, featuring articles, tutorials, and tools for bloggers, web designers, and developers.

name: Sentry
description: Sentry's website showcases the error and performance monitoring platform's features, integrations, and pricing.

name: Sentry Blog
description: Sentry's blog provides articles, tutorials, and insights about software development, error monitoring, and more.

name: SentryWorld
description: SentryWorld is a resource hub and community for developers, featuring articles, podcasts, and webinars about software development, monitoring, and error handling.
